title: Wear Calculator
summary: Wear Calculator reimagines the calculator for Smartwatches.

description: The normal Calculator Input tends to be really hard on small Smartwatch Displays. Wear Calculator tries to solve this problem by providing a unique way of entering your wished number. To do so you just have to spin a wheel till you reach your desired number.Features:- Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division- Unique Input- Live-Preview of Result- Choose from all Colors of the Material-Design Color Palette: Backgroundcolor, Wheelcolor, Textcolor, Buttoncolor & more (PRO-Function)Only tested on Moto 360.
descriptionHTML:
The normal Calculator Input tends to be really hard on small Smartwatch Displays. Wear Calculator tries to solve this problem by providing a unique way of entering your wished number. To do so you just have to spin a wheel till you reach your desired number.

Features:

- Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division
- Unique Input
- Live-Preview of Result
- Choose from all Colors of the Material-Design Color Palette: Backgroundcolor, Wheelcolor, Textcolor, Buttoncolor & more (PRO-Function)

Only tested on Moto 360.
recentChanges: FIX [WEAR]: Dismiss Overlay now triggers consistently
